Create a hair tie line for professionals: Develop a line of hair ties that are specifically designed for professionals who need to keep their hair out of the way while at work. The hair ties could be made with high-quality materials that are comfortable to wear for long periods of time, and come in a variety of colors and patterns to suit different personalities.

Make hair ties out of recycled materials: Create a line of hair ties made from recycled materials, such as plastic bottles or old t-shirts. This would be a great way to reduce waste and promote sustainability, while also creating a unique and eco-friendly product.

Design hair ties for different hair types: Develop a line of hair ties that are specifically designed for different hair types, such as curly or straight hair. This would help ensure that the hair ties are comfortable and effective for everyone, regardless of their hair type.

Create hair ties with built-in hair accessories: Develop a line of hair ties that come with built-in hair accessories, such as beads or charms. This would add an extra touch of style and personalization to the hair ties, and make them even more appealing to customers.

Develop a hair tie subscription service: Create a subscription service that delivers a new hair tie to customers on a regular basis. This would be a great way to keep customers engaged and coming back for more, and could also help them discover new and exciting hair tie styles.
